briefTitle: Study of HEMAX PFS Versus EPREX/ ERYPO® in Predialysis Chronic Kidney Disease
officialTitle: A Randomized, Comparative Study of HEMAX PFS® Versus EPREX/ ERYPO® in the Treatment of Anemia With Epoetin Alfa in Patients With Predialysis Chronic Kidney Disease
summary: Phase III, multicenter, randomized, open, controlled clinical trial. A study designed as phase III, in 120 patients with chronic renal failure in the pre-dialysis stage, evaluate efficacy and safety of Hemax PFS® (PFS: prefilled syringes) vs the innovator erythropoietin alfa product (Eprex®).

primaryOutcome.measure: Efficacy Evaluation Through Change in Hemoglobin Levels
